name: sshCommand
title: SSH Command Activity
description: Execute SSH commands on remote servers
author: Marco Commissaris <marco.commissairs@cloud.com>

display.name: Log Level
display.description: Set the log level for this activity.

inputs.name: sshservername
inputs.description: SSH server hostname or IP address

inputs.name: sshcommand
inputs.description: Command to execute on the remote server

outputs.name: statuscode
outputs.description: Exit status code of the executed command

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: Output result from the executed command
